A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Felt a huge disconnect between the previous movie and this one. The dialogue between the characters had no sustenance and fell flat due to unoriginal content pulled from children's movies. Characters who once shined in episode 7 became dull and annoying in episode 8. The plot was extremely rushed and in the end we are left in the same location where we were at the end of episode 7. I believe it would be best if the director didn't write the next film for the sake of the franchise.
